tagline: We don't do 99. We keep it 100.
rules:
❤️‍🔥 Welcome to THE HUNDRED ❤️‍🔥
Hosted by TwerkTaco — Party like legends.


📜 RULES TO KEEP THE VIBE STRONG:
🔞 18+ ONLY. Security will be checking at the door.
💢 Leave the drama at home — we’re all grown-ass adults.
🤝 Respect everyone. No racism, no hate — we thrive on diversity.
🎧 If there’s a DJ playing, do NOT micspam your music.
🛡️ Show respect to our Mods and Staff — they’re here for your vibe & safety.
We don't do 99. Keep it 100.
infoBoard:
WELCOME TO THE HUNDRED
We don't do 99․ We keep it 100․
Founder˸ TwerkTaco
Built for the bold․ Designed for the elite․
THE HUNDRED is not just a name its a standard․
A collective of creators‚ performers‚ and pioneers shaping the future of virtual fashion‚ nightlife‚ and influence․
Whether youre here to stand out‚ show off‚ or build your name‚ youre in the right place․
Respect is everything․
We move with purpose‚ protect our people‚ and elevate the scene․
Take a moment to check the rules‚ we keep it 100‚ always․
Lets make legacy look effortless․
This is THE HUNDRED․
